title: To Find a Mountain
description: Set in Italy during World War Two, TO FIND A MOUNTAIN tells the incredible story of a young woman named Benedetta Carlessimo. When Benedetta's house is taken over by the German Command and her father is forced to fight for the Germans at the front lines, she is left alone to protect her family and survive the violent, battle scarred German soldiers living in her home.Ultimately, Benedetta engages in a very real fight for her own survival, with the lives of those closest to her hanging in the balance.TO FIND A MOUNTAIN is an unforgettable portrait of a war, a family, and a young woman who faces terrifying evil with incomparable bravery.TO FIND A MOUNTAIN is based on true events.
author: Dani Amore
